turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey assistant, order me a Energy Vanilla Drink of Starbucks

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, do you want it shipped to your location?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. And let me know how long should I wait.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Placing the order and charged to your default payment method, it should take about 20 min to arrive on current traffic. Do you wish to order anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. I want to order a pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. I found you have Dominos, Little Caesars and Pizza Hut close to your location.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Which one is closer or will serve me faster?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: From what I can see Pizza Hut will have your order faster at this moment, with up to 25min delivery.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to order from there then.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, What do you wish to order from Pizza Hut?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I am not sure, which pizzas toppings do they have available?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: On this location they have, Cheese, Pepperoni and Supreme they also allow you to make your own selection. Which one do you wish to select?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Do they have any deals available?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They do. At the moment you can order 2-topping for $7.99 and $5 dollar Pizza item if you order 2 or more items. Do you wish to order any of these deals instead?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No. I'll just go ahead and order a Cheese pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it. What size do you want it? Large or Medium

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Medium size.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it, how many of them do you wish to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Just one.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it, One Cheese Medium pizza. Do you want to add any additional item or sides?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it. Do you wish to include anything to drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. I want to Include a Dr Pepper drink.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Oh sorry, they seem to not have Dr Pepper available. They have Mountain Dew, Pepsi, Diet Pepsi and Sierra Mist. Do you want any of those?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. I'll go with Pepsi. 20 ounces drink please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it. So to recap, your order is One Cheese Pizza Medium size, and 20 ounces drink of Pepsi. For $8.99. Does it sounds good?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright. Placing order now. You will be charged on your default payment method, you also will receive a text message shortly disclosing the receipt of your purchase and your order will be in your home up to 25 mintures.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You are welcome.
